Name: ClonePage
skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage showsidebar="true" showheader="true" tabtooverride="skuid__Page__c" unsavedchangeswarning="" globalfeedbackenabled="false">
  <labels/>
  <models>
    <model id="PageData" limit="1" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Page__c" doclone="yes" datasourcetype="" type="">
      <fields>
        <field id="skuid__Layout__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout2__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout3__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout4__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout5__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Module__c"/>
        <field id="OwnerId"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="Id"/>
        <field id="Owner.Name" targetobjects="User"/>
        <field id="skuid__Type__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__r.Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__IsMaster__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Max_Auto_Saves__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="param" enclosevalueinquotes="true" operator="=" value="Id" field="Id" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
  </models>
  <components>
    <pagetitle model="PageData">
      <maintitle>Clone {{Model.Label}}</maintitle>
      <subtitle>
        <template>{{Model.Label}}</template>
      </subtitle>
      <actions>
        <action type="savecancel" afterSave="/{{Id}}" afterCancel="/{{$Param.id}}" saveLabel="Create Cloned Page" window="self">
          <savehotkeys>
            <hotkey modifiers="ctrl" key="s"/>
            <hotkey modifiers="meta" key="s"/>
          </savehotkeys>
          <cancelhotkeys/>
          <renderconditions/>
        </action>
      </actions>
    </pagetitle>
    <basicfieldeditor showsavecancel="false" showheader="true" model="PageData" mode="edit">
      <columns>
        <column width="100%">
          <sections>
            <section title="New Page Information">
              <fields>
                <field id="Name" required="true"/>
                <field id="skuid__Module__c"/>
                <field id="OwnerId">
                  <label>Page Owner</label>
                  <filters/>
                </field>
              </fields>
            </section>
          </sections>
        </column>
      </columns>
    </basicfieldeditor>
  </components>
  <resources>
    <labels/>
    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="inline" name="setDefaultsOnClonedRecord" url="">
// When cloning Pages in protected modules,
// we want to set the default Module to be '' instead.
// Also, when the Owner.Name is 'Skuid',
// we want to set the OwnerId to be the running user.
$j().ready(function(){
    var model = skuid.model.getModel('PageData');

    if (model && model.data.length) {
        var row = model.getFirstRow(),
            needToRedraw = false;
        if (model.getFieldValue(row,'Owner.Name') == 'Skuid') {
            model.updateRow(row,'OwnerId',skuid.utils.userInfo.userId);
            model.updateRow(row,'Owner',{Name:skuid.utils.userInfo.name});
            needToRedraw = true;
        }
        
        if (model.getFieldValue(row,'skuid__Module__c') == 'Skuid') {
            model.updateRow(row,'skuid__Module__c',null);
            needToRedraw = true;
        }

        // Now redraw our list, if necessary
        if (needToRedraw) {
            $j.each(model.registeredLists,function(listId,list){
                list.render({doNotCache:true});
            });
        }

    }
});
</jsitem>
    </javascript>
    <css/>
  </resources>
</skuidpage>

Name: CredentialsManagement
skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" globalfeedbackenabled="false" personalizationmode="server">
  <models>
    <model id="cm_ModelDataSources" limit="" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasourcetype="" type="" sobject="skuid__Model_Service__c" doclone="" orderby="Name" datasource="salesforce" processonclient="true">
      <fields>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="Id"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="user" field="skuid__Credential_Source__c" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="cm_AuthProviders" limit="" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" type="" sobject="skuid__Auth_Provider__c" doclone="" orderby="Name" datasource="salesforce" processonclient="true">
      <fields>
        <field id="Id"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__Authorize_Endpoint_Url__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Client_Id__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Default_Scopes__c"/>

      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="oauth2" field="skuid__Auth_Method__c" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="cm_ModelDataSourceCreds" limit="" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasourcetype="" type="" sobject="skuid__Model_Service_Credential__c" orderby="skuid__Service_Name__c" doclone="" processonclient="true" unloadwarningifunsavedchanges="false" datasource="salesforce" label="Data Source Credential" labelplural="Data Source Credentials">
      <fields>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__Applies_To__c" overridemetadata="true" required="true"/>
        <field id="skuid__Service_Name__c" overridemetadata="true" required="true"/>
        <field id="skuid__Username__c" overridemetadata="true" displaytype="TEXT" length="80"/>
        <field id="skuid__Password__c"/>

      <conditions/>

        <action>

          </actions>

          </events>
        </action>
      </actions>
    </model>
    <model id="cm_OAuthCredentials" sobject="skuid__Auth_Provider_Credential__c" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" type="" limit="" orderby="skuid__Auth_Provider__c" label="OAuth Credential" labelplural="OAuth Credentials" datasource="salesforce" processonclient="true">
      <fields>
        <field id="skuid__Auth_Provider__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Access_Token_Expiration__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Access_Token_Issued__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Access_Token__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Refresh_Token__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Refresh_Token_Issued__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Times_Refresh_Token_Used__c"/>
        <field id="Auth_Provider_Name__ui" label="Auth Provider" displaytype="FORMULA" uionly="true" returntype="TEXT" readonly="true">
          <formula>MODEL_LOOKUP("cm_AuthProviders","Name","Id",{{skuid__Auth_Provider__c}})</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="Auth_Provider_Oauth_Type__ui" label="Auth Provider Type" displaytype="FORMULA" uionly="true" returntype="TEXT" readonly="true">
          <formula>MODEL_LOOKUP("cm_AuthProviders","skuid__Type__c","Id",{{skuid__Auth_Provider__c}})</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="action" label="Action" displaytype="TEXT" accessible="true" createable="true" editable="true" filterable="false" required="false" uionly="true"/>
        <field id="AccessToken__ui" displaytype="FORMULA" uionly="true" label="Has Access Token" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" readonly="true" returntype="BOOLEAN">
          <formula>!ISBLANK({{skuid__Access_Token__c}})</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="RefreshToken__ui" displaytype="FORMULA" uionly="true" label="Has Refresh Token" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" readonly="true" returntype="BOOLEAN">
          <formula>!ISBLANK({{skuid__Refresh_Token__c}})</formula>
        </field>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions>
        <action>
          <events>
            <event>models.loaded</event>
          </events>
          <actions>
            <action type="custom" snippet="skuid.credentialsManagement.populateOAuthCredentials"/>
          </actions>
        </action>
      </actions>
    </model>
    <model id="cm_EncryptionSettings" limit="1" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasourcetype="" type="" sobject="skuid__Encryption_Settings__c" datasource="salesforce">
      <fields>
        <field id="skuid__JobId__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="userinfo" value="" field="SetupOwnerId" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" userinfotype="organizationid"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
  </models>
  <pageregioncontents>
    <pageregioncontent regionid="sk-1uFo3V-67" uniqueid="sk-2ghgL6-74">
      <components>
        <pagetitle model="cm_ModelDataSources" uniqueid="sk-2giu9o-153" cssclass="fs-block">
          <maintitle>{{$Label.MyCredentials}}</maintitle>
          <actions>
            <action type="multi" label="{{$Label.save}}" icon="sk-icon-save" uniqueid="sk-G6r0y-266">
              <actions>
                <action type="blockUI" message="Saving Credentials..."/>
                <action type="save">
                  <models>
                    <model>cm_ModelDataSourceCreds</model>
                    <model>cm_OAuthCredentials</model>
                  </models>
                  <onerroractions>
                    <action type="blockUI" message="There was an error saving your Data Source Credentials" timeout="3000"/>
                  </onerroractions>
                </action>
                <action type="requeryModels" behavior="standard">
                  <models>
                    <model>cm_ModelDataSourceCreds</model>
                    <model>cm_OAuthCredentials</model>
                  </models>
                </action>
                <action type="unblockUI"/>
              </actions>
              <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
              <enableconditions logictype="custom" logic="(1 OR 2) AND 3">
                <condition fieldmodel="cm_ModelDataSourceCreds" sourcetype="modelproperty" sourceproperty="hasChanged" type="fieldvalue" value="true" enclosevalueinquotes="false" operator="="/>
                <condition type="fieldvalue" enclosevalueinquotes="false" fieldmodel="cm_OAuthCredentials" sourcetype="modelproperty" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" sourceproperty="hasChanged" value="true" operator="="/>
                <condition type="blank" operator="=" fieldmodel="cm_EncryptionSettings" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="skuid__JobId__c" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
              </enableconditions>
              <hotkeys>
                <hotkey modifiers="ctrl" key="s"/>
                <hotkey modifiers="meta" key="s"/>
              </hotkeys>
            </action>
          </actions>
          <subtitle>{{$User.name}} ({{$User.userName}})</subtitle>
          <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
        </pagetitle>
        <wrapper uniqueid="sk-1bgVea-222">
          <components>
            <template multiple="true" uniqueid="sk-1bga2B-230" cssclass="nx-warning" model="cm_EncryptionSettings">
              <contents>The Master Encryption Key is currently being changed. Changes to encrypted fields are disabled until this process completes. Please try again later.</contents>
            </template>
          </components>
          <styles>
            <styleitem type="background"/>
            <styleitem type="border"/>
            <styleitem type="size"/>
          </styles>
          <renderconditions logictype="and">
            <rendercondition type="blank" operator="!=" fieldmodel="cm_EncryptionSettings" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="skipandnorender" field="skuid__JobId__c" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
          </renderconditions>
        </wrapper>
        <tabset rememberlastusertab="true" defertabrendering="true" uniqueid="CredentialsTabs" renderas="">
          <tabs>
            <tab name="OAuth Credentials" uniqueid="OAuthCredentials">
              <components>
                <skootable showconditions="true" showsavecancel="false" showerrorsinline="true" searchmethod="client" searchbox="true" showexportbuttons="false" pagesize="10" createrecords="false" model="cm_OAuthCredentials" buttonposition="" mode="read" allowcolumnreordering="false" uniqueid="sk-2r33Le-189" emptysearchbehavior="query" searchplaceholdertext="{{$Label.search}} {{$Label.MyCredentials}}">
                  <fields>
                    <field id="Auth_Provider_Name__ui" hideable="false" uniqueid="fi-G978Z-1125" valuehalign="" type=""/>
                    <field id="AccessToken__ui" hideable="false" uniqueid="fi-3OheEv-376" type="" valuehalign="" readonly="true"/>
                    <field id="skuid__Access_Token_Issued__c" hideable="false" uniqueid="fi-3OhIWi-263" valuehalign="" type="" readonly="true"/>
                    <field id="skuid__Access_Token_Expiration__c" hideable="false" uniqueid="fi-2r399B-216" valuehalign="" type="" readonly="true"/>
                    <field id="RefreshToken__ui" hideable="false" uniqueid="fi-3Ohzoe-492" type="" valuehalign=""/>
                    <field id="skuid__Refresh_Token_Issued__c" hideable="false" uniqueid="fi-3OhKRB-277" valuehalign="" type="" readonly="true"/>
                    <field id="skuid__Times_Refresh_Token_Used__c" hideable="false" uniqueid="fi-3OhKsG-286" valuehalign="" type="" readonly="true"/>
                  </fields>
                  <rowactions/>
                  <massactions usefirstitemasdefault="true"/>
                  <views>
                    <view type="standard"/>
                  </views>
                  <searchfields/>
                </skootable>
              </components>
              <renderconditions logictype="and">
                <rendercondition sourcetype="feature" value="Server Side OAuth" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
              </renderconditions>
            </tab>
            <tab name="Username / Password Credentials" uniqueid="UsernamePasswordCredentials">
              <components>
                <skootable showconditions="true" showsavecancel="false" showerrorsinline="true" searchmethod="client" searchbox="true" showexportbuttons="false" pagesize="25" createrecords="false" model="cm_ModelDataSourceCreds" buttonposition="" mode="edit" uniqueid="MSCTable" emptysearchbehavior="query" searchplaceholdertext="{{$Label.search}} {{$Label.MyCredentials}}">
                  <fields>
                    <field id="skuid__Service_Name__c" valuehalign="" type="" readonly="true" required="true" uniqueid="sk-G6r2z-325">
                      <label>Data Source</label>
                    </field>
                    <field id="skuid__Username__c" uniqueid="sk-G6r2--328" cssclass="fs-block"/>
                    <field id="skuid__Password__c" uniqueid="sk-G6r31-331" type="PASSWORD" cssclass="fs-block"/>
                    <field type="COMBO" valuehalign="" uniqueid="sk-G6r32-334" cssclass="fs-block">

                    </field>
                  </fields>
                  <rowactions>

                  </massactions>
                  <views>

                  </views>
                  <searchfields/>
                  <renderconditions logictype="and"></renderconditions>
                </skootable>

            </tab>
          </tabs>
          <renderconditions logictype="and">
            <rendercondition type="blank" operator="=" fieldmodel="cm_EncryptionSettings" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="skipandnorender" field="skuid__JobId__c" fieldtargetobjects="skuid__Encryption_Settings__c" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
          </renderconditions>

  <resources>

	<pageregioncontents>
		<pageregioncontent regionid="sk-1uFo3V-67" uniqueid="sk-Tou-425">
			<components>
				<skuid__wrapper uniqueid="sk-3fkY-754" styleSettingsVariant="147b44cd-3667-46bf-b92f-a6d8ec4227af">
					<components>
						<skuid__wrapper uniqueid="sk-3fkb-769">
							<components>
								<skuid__grid uniqueid="sk-3fkh-803" flexDirection="row" justifyContent="flex-start" alignItems="flex-start" columnGutter="0" rowGutter="0">
									<divisions>
										<division minWidth="100px" ratio="1" alignSelf="auto">
											<components>
												<skuid__header title="Design Systems" uniqueid="sk-3Gt2-1203"/>
											</components>
										</division>
										<division alignSelf="auto" minWidth="100px" ratio="1">
											<components>
												<skuid__buttonSet uniqueid="sk-3fkq-871">
													<groups>
														<skuid__buttonGroup>
															<buttons>
																<skuid__button label="Update Design Systems" uniqueid="sk-1S5a-664">
																	<tooltip position="top" text="Update all design systems to account for Skuid's latest component structure and styles."/>
																	<actions>
																		<action type="showModal">
																			<skuid__modal title="Update your design systems?" width="640px" buttonsJustification="right">
																				<components>
																					<skuid__text contents="This process ensures that any recent updates to Skuid&#39;s component structure and styles are propagated to each design system. This just means that your styles will be applied correctly. Your variables and style variants will not be affected.<br />
<br />
You may export your design systems as local backups prior to updating.<br />
<br />
This process may take several minutes as Skuid updates the rules of each design system. This will also save any pending changes in the Design Systems table below." uniqueid="sk-1VyU-227">
																						<styles>
																							<spacing bottom="4"/>
																						</styles>
																					</skuid__text>
																				</components>
																				<buttons>
																					<skuid__button label="Update" uniqueid="sk-1Vym-238" styleSettingsVariant="primary">

																							<action type="closeTopmostPopup"/>
																							<action type="custom" snippet="skuid.themebuilder.updateDesignSystems"/>
																							<action type="action-sequence" action-sequence-id="4e99615b-386a-4aaa-822f-35987da0419b" input-loaderServiceNameField="skuid__Loader_Service_Name__c">
																								<inputs>
																									<input name="cacheInvalidationModel" value="stng__LoaderServiceCacheInvalidation"/>
																									<input name="loaderServiceName" value="themeService"/>
																									<input name="loaderServiceNameField" value="skuid__Loader_Service_Name__c"/>

		<jsitem location="staticresource" name="" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="skuid" content_type="application/zip" filepath="js/skuidPages/themeBuilderUtils.js"/>

		<jsitem location="inline" name="buttonHider" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
  var $ = skuid.$;
  function checkShow(rows, field){
    var filteredRows = rows.filter(function(row) { 
      return skuid.themeBuilder.utils.baseThemes.indexOf(row.skuid__Resource_Name__c) === -1; 
    });
    var model = skuid.$M("UiDriver"),
        record = model.getFirstRow(),
        shouldShowButton = false;
    $.each(filteredRows, function(i, el){
        if(el.skuid__Skuid_Version_Date__c != skuid.version.date && el.skuid__Skuid_Version_Date__c != '-1'){
            shouldShowButton = true;
        }
    });
    var recordUpdate = {};
    recordUpdate[field] = shouldShowButton;
    model.updateRow(record, recordUpdate);
  }
  function getRowsInModels(modelIds) {
      var rows = [];
      modelIds.forEach(function(modelId){
         var model = skuid.$M(modelId);
         if (model) {
             var modelRows = model.getRows();
             if (modelRows && modelRows.length) {
                 Array.prototype.push.apply(rows, modelRows);
             }
         }
      });
      return rows;
  }
  skuid.events.subscribe('models.saved', function(data){
        checkShow(getRowsInModels([
          "stng__Design_Systems",
        ]), "showUpdateDesignSystemsButton");
  });

  $(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
        checkShow(getRowsInModels([
          "stng__Design_Systems",
        ]), "showUpdateDesignSystemsButton");
      
  });
})(skuid);</jsitem>
	</javascript>
	<actionsequences uniqueid="sk-Ttw-519"/>
</resources>

      <jsitem location="inline" name="UtilSnippets" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
    var $ = skuid.$;
    
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
	    var titles = $('.nx-pagebuilder-title-main'); 
	    // Theres a weird bug where if you're editing the pagebuilder
	    // with the pagebuilder, 2 titles will appear. So we just remove
	    // the second one
	    /*
		if(titles[1]){
		    titles[1].remove();
		}
		*/
		titles.prependTo('.nx-pagebuilder-toolbar-wrapper');
	});
	
	//  Set the new Child Page XML
	skuid.snippet.register('skuid.pagebuilder.setChildPageXML',function(config){
        var model = config.model,
            row = config.row,
            pageXML = '<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes">' +
            	'<models/>' +
            	'<pageregioncontents/>' +
            	'<components/>' + // Shouldn't be needed, but...
            	'<resources>' +
            		'<labels/>' +
            		'<css/>' +
            		'<javascript/>' +
            	'</resources>' +
            	'</skuidpage>';
        
        skuid.utils.writeXmlToPageLayoutFields(pageXML,model,row);
	});
})(skuid);</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inline" name="setDefaultsOnClonedRecord" url="">
// When cloning Pages in protected modules,
// we want to set the default Module to be '' instead.
// Also, when the Owner.Name is 'Skuid',
// we want to set the OwnerId to be the running user.
$j().ready(function(){
    var model = skuid.model.getModel('PageData');

    if (model && model.data.length) {
        var row = model.getFirstRow(),
            needToRedraw = false;
        if (model.getFieldValue(row,'Owner.Name') == 'Skuid') {
            model.updateRow(row,'OwnerId',skuid.utils.userInfo.userId);
            model.updateRow(row,'Owner',{Name:skuid.utils.userInfo.name});
            needToRedraw = true;
        }
        
        if (model.getFieldValue(row,'skuid__Module__c') == 'Skuid') {
            model.updateRow(row,'skuid__Module__c',null);
            needToRedraw = true;
        }

        // Now redraw our list, if necessary
        if (needToRedraw) {
            $j.each(model.registeredLists,function(listId,list){
                list.render({doNotCache:true});
            });
        }

    }
});
</jsitem>

      <cssitem location="inline" name="pageCollaboration" cachelocation="false">.interaction-container {
    margin-top: 3px;
    float: right;
    margin-right: 10px;
}

.interaction-container.hibernating {
    opacity: 0.3;
}

.interaction-avatar {
    display: none;
    position: relative;
    margin-left: 3px;
}

.interaction-avatar IMG {
    background-color: white;
    height: 25px;
}

.interaction-avatar.composerOpened IMG {
    border: solid 1px #212324;
}

.interaction-avatar.composerUnsavedChanges IMG {
    border: solid 1px red;
}

.interaction-avatar.stale IMG {
    opacity: 0.3;
}

.interaction-avatar .unsaved-changes-warning {
    display: none;
    /* Prevent the warning icon from grabbing the focus and preventing the tooltip from showing */
    pointer-events: none;
}

.interaction-avatar.composerUnsavedChanges .unsaved-changes-warning {
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
	left: 0;
	bottom: 0;
	color: red;
	text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px black;
}</cssitem>

                </buttonset>
              </components>
            </popup>
          </action>
        </actions>

                              </action>
                              <action type="requeryModels" model="pgs__SelectedPage" behavior="standard">
                                <models>
                                  <model>pgs__pagedata</model>
                                  <model>pgs__SelectedPage</model>
                                  <model>pgs__SelectedPageVersions</model>
                                </models>
                              </action>
                              <action type="blockUI" message="Page revision restored!" timeout="1500"/>
                            </actions>
                          </action>
                        </rowactions>
                        <massactions usefirstitemasdefault="true"/>
                        <views>
                          <view type="standard"/>
                        </views>
                        <actions defaultlabel="Global Actions" defaulticon="sk-icon-magic" usefirstitemasdefault="true"/>
                        <filters>
                          <filter type="toggle" filteroffoptionlabel="New Filter" createfilteroffoption="true" affectcookies="true" autocompthreshold="25" label="Hide Auto Saves">
                            <effects>
                              <effect action="activate" value="" condition="IsNotAutoSave"/>
                            </effects>
                          </filter>
                        </filters>
                      </skootable>
                    </components>
                  </popup>
                </action>
                <action type="unblockUI"/>
              </actions>
            </action>
          </rowactions>
          <filters>
            <filter type="select" createfilteroffoption="true" affectcookies="true" autocompthreshold="25" conditionsource="auto" labelmode="auto" filtermethod="server" conditionfield="skuid__API_Version__c" filteroffoptionlabel="Any API Version"/>
            <filter type="select" filteroffoptionlabel="Any Page Type" createfilteroffoption="false" affectcookies="true" condition="" conditionsource="manual" labelmode="no">
              <sources>
                <source type="manual">
                  <options>
                    <option label="Any Page Type" type="complex">
                      <effects>
                        <effect action="deactivate" value="" condition="IsDesktopPage"/>
                        <effect action="deactivate" value="" condition="IsMobilePage"/>
                        <effect action="deactivate" value="" condition="IsMaster"/>
                      </effects>
                    </option>
                    <option label="Desktop Pages" type="complex">
                      <effects>
                        <effect action="activate" value="" condition="IsDesktopPage"/>
                        <effect action="deactivate" value="" condition="IsMobilePage"/>
                        <effect action="deactivate" value="" condition="IsMaster"/>
                      </effects>
                    </option>
                    <option label="Mobile Pages" type="complex">
                      <effects>
                        <effect action="activate" value="" condition="IsMobilePage"/>
                        <effect action="deactivate" value="" condition="IsDesktopPage"/>
                        <effect action="deactivate" value="" condition="IsMaster"/>
                      </effects>
                    </option>
                    <option label="Master Pages" type="complex">
                      <effects>
                        <effect action="deactivate" value="" condition="IsMobilePage"/>
                        <effect action="deactivate" value="" condition="IsDesktopPage"/>
                        <effect action="activate" value="" condition="IsMaster"/>
                      </effects>
                    </option>
                  </options>
                </source>
              </sources>
            </filter>
            <filter type="select" condition="PagesModule" filteroffoptionlabel="Any Module" createfilteroffoption="false" conditionsource="manual" labelmode="no">
              <sources>
                <source type="manual">
                  <options>
                    <option label="Any Module" type="complex">
                      <effects>
                        <effect action="deactivate" value="" condition="PagesModule"/>
                        <effect action="deactivate" value="" condition="NoModule"/>
                      </effects>
                    </option>
                  </options>
                </source>
                <source type="metadata" prefix="Module: " suffix="" effectsbehavior="defaultandothers">
                  <effects>
                    <effect action="deactivate" value="" condition="NoModule"/>
                  </effects>
                </source>
                <source type="manual" effectsbehavior="justdefault">
                  <options>
                    <option label="No Module" type="complex">
                      <effects>
                        <effect action="activate" value="" condition="NoModule"/>
                        <effect action="deactivate" value="" condition="PagesModule"/>
                      </effects>
                    </option>
                  </options>
                </source>
              </sources>
            </filter>
            <filter type="select" createfilteroffoption="true" filteroffoptionlabel="Select a Filter..." conditionsource="manual" labelmode="no">
              <sources>
                <source type="manual">
                  <options>
                    <option label="Last Modified by Me" type="complex">
                      <effects>
                        <effect action="activate" value="" condition="LastModByMe"/>
                      </effects>
                    </option>
                    <option label="Last Modified by Me TODAY" type="complex" value="TODAY">
                      <effects>
                        <effect action="set" value="TODAY" condition="LastModDate"/>
                        <effect action="activate" value="" condition="LastModByMe"/>
                      </effects>
                    </option>
                    <option label="Last Modified by Me YESTERDAY" type="complex">
                      <effects>
                        <effect action="set" value="YESTERDAY" condition="LastModDate"/>
                        <effect action="activate" value="" condition="LastModByMe"/>
                      </effects>
                    </option>
                    <option label="Last Modified by Me THIS WEEK" type="complex">
                      <effects>
                        <effect action="set" value="THIS_WEEK" condition="LastModDate"/>
                        <effect action="activate" value="" condition="LastModByMe"/>
                      </effects>
                    </option>
                    <option label="Last Modified by Me IN LAST 7 DAYS" type="complex">
                      <effects>
                        <effect action="set" value="LAST_N_DAYS:7" condition="LastModDate"/>
                        <effect action="activate" value="" condition="LastModByMe"/>
                      </effects>
                    </option>
                    <option label="Created by Me" type="complex">
                      <effects>
                        <effect action="activate" value="" condition="CreatedByMe"/>
                      </effects>
                    </option>
                    <option label="Created by Me TODAY" type="complex">
                      <effects>
                        <effect action="set" value="TODAY" condition="CreatedDate"/>
                        <effect action="activate" value="" condition="CreatedByMe"/>
                      </effects>
                    </option>
                    <option label="Created by Me YESTERDAY" type="complex">
                      <effects>
                        <effect action="set" value="YESTERDAY" condition="CreatedDate"/>
                        <effect action="activate" value="" condition="CreatedByMe"/>
                      </effects>
                    </option>
                    <option label="Created by Me THIS WEEK" type="complex">
                      <effects>
                        <effect action="set" value="THIS_WEEK" condition="CreatedDate"/>
                        <effect action="activate" value="" condition="CreatedByMe"/>
                      </effects>
                    </option>
                    <option label="Created by Me LAST 7 DAYS" type="complex">
                      <effects>
                        <effect action="set" value="LAST_N_DAYS:7" condition="CreatedDate"/>
                        <effect action="activate" value="" condition="CreatedByMe"/>
                      </effects>
                    </option>
                  </options>
                </source>
              </sources>
            </filter>
          </filters>
          <massactions defaultlabel="Mass Actions" defaulticon="" usefirstitemasdefault="true">
            <action type="massupdate">
              <hotkeys>
                <hotkey modifiers="ctrl,shift" key="u"/>
                <hotkey modifiers="meta,shift" key="u"/>
              </hotkeys>
            </action>
            <action type="massdelete">
              <hotkeys>
                <hotkey modifiers="ctrl,shift" key="backspace"/>
                <hotkey modifiers="meta,shift" key="backspace"/>
              </hotkeys>
            </action>
            <action type="multi" label="Build Page Pack" icon="sk-icon-page-package">
              <hotkeys/>
              <drawer title="Drawer Area" width="90%" closehandle="true">
                <components/>
              </drawer>
              <actions>
                <action type="requeryModel" model="pgs__PagesInStaticResources" behavior="standard"/>
                <action type="showPopup">
                  <popup title="Build Page Pack" width="80%">
                    <components>
                      <pagetitle model="pgs__StaticResourceInfoForPackaging">
                        <maintitle>Create or Update a Skuid Page Pack</maintitle>
                        <actions>
                          <action type="custom" label="Build Page Pack" window="self" snippet="skuid.pageList.packagePages" icon="sk-icon-page-package">
                            <hotkeys>
                              <hotkey modifiers="" key="return" ignoretextinputs="true"/>
                            </hotkeys>
                          </action>
                          <action type="multi" label="Cancel" icon="sk-icon-cancel">
                            <actions>
                              <action type="emptyModelData">
                                <models>
                                  <model>pgs__PageModuleForPackaging</model>
                                  <model>pgs__StaticResourceInfoForPackaging</model>
                                </models>
                              </action>
                              <action type="closeTopmostPopup"/>
                            </actions>
                          </action>
                        </actions>
                      </pagetitle>
                      <tabset rememberlastusertab="false" defertabrendering="true" renderas="radio" uniqueid="PagePackDetailsTabSet">
                        <tabs>
                          <tab name="Create New Pack" icon="sk-icon-add">
                            <components>
                              <basicfieldeditor showheader="true" showsavecancel="false" model="pgs__StaticResourceInfoForPackaging" buttonposition="" mode="edit">
                                <columns>
                                  <column width="100%">
                                    <sections>
                                      <section title="Details" collapsible="no">
                                        <fields>
                                          <field id="Name" valuehalign="" type=""/>
                                          <field id="Description"/>
                                        </fields>
                                      </section>
                                    </sections>
                                  </column>
                                </columns>
                              </basicfieldeditor>
                            </components>
                          </tab>
                          <tab name="Select Existing Pack" loadlazypanels="true" icon="sk-icon-edit">
                            <components>
                              <skootable showconditions="true" showsavecancel="false" searchmethod="server" searchbox="true" showexportbuttons="false" pagesize="5" createrecords="false" buttonposition="left" mode="readonly" model="pgs__PagesInStaticResources" searchplaceholdertext="Enter the name of a Pack..." emptysearchbehavior="remove">
                                <fields>
                                  <field type="COMBO" allowhtml="true">
                                    <template><input type="radio" name="existingPagePack" value="{{{Id}}}"></template>
                                  </field>
                                  <field id="Name"/>
                                  <field id="NamespacePrefix" valuehalign="" type="" readonly="true">
                                    <label>Namespace</label>
                                  </field>
                                  <field id="BodyLength"/>
                                  <field id="Description"/>
                                  <field type="COMBO">
                                    <label>Last Modified</label>
                                    <template>{{LastModifiedById}} ({{LastModifiedDate}})</template>
                                  </field>
                                </fields>
                                <rowactions/>
                                <massactions usefirstitemasdefault="true"/>
                                <views>
                                  <view type="standard"/>
                                </views>
                                <searchfields/>
                              </skootable>
                            </components>
                          </tab>
                        </tabs>
                      </tabset>
                    </components>
                  </popup>
                </action>
              </actions>
            </action>
          </massactions>
          <searchfields/>
        </skootable>
      </components>
    </pageregioncontent>
  </pageregioncontents>
  <components/>
  <resources>
    <labels/>
    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="v1" namespace="skuid" filepath="js/skuidPages/skuidPageList.js" cachelocation="false"/>
    </javascript>
    <css>
      <cssitem location="inline" name="pagelistcss" cachelocation="false">.nx-page-region {
    margin: 17px;
}</cssitem>
    </css>
    <actionsequences/>
  </resources>
</skuidpage>

Name: Settings_AuthProviderDetail
skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage globalfeedbackenabled="false" title="{{#$Model.stng__AuthProviders.data.0.Name}}Auth Provider - {{{$Model.stng__AuthProviders.data.0.Name}}}{{/$Model.stng__AuthProviders.data.0.Name}}{{^$Model.stng__AuthProviders.data.0.Name}}New Auth Provider{{/$Model.stng__AuthProviders.data.0.Name}}">
  <models>
    <model id="stng__AuthProviders" limit="" query="true" createrowifnonefound="true" type="" sobject="skuid__Auth_Provider__c" doclone="" orderby="Name" datasource="salesforce" processonclient="true">
      <fields>
        <field id="skuid__Authorize_Endpoint_URL__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Client_Id__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Custom_Callback_URL__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Client_Secret__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Default_Scopes__c"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="SetupOwnerId"/>
        <field id="SetupOwner.Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__Type__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" picklistsource="snippet" snippet="AuthProviderTypesPicklist"/>
        <field id="skuid__Token_Endpoint_URL__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__User_Info_Endpoint_URL__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Request_Headers__c" overridemetadata="true" displaytype="OBJECT"/>
        <field id="skuid__OAuth_Grant_Type__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" defaultValue="explicit" picklistsource="manual" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry label="Authorization Code" value="explicit"/>
            <entry label="Client Credentials" value="client_credentials"/>
            <entry label="Implicit" value="implicit"/>
            <entry label="Resource Owner Password Credentials" value="password"/>
            <entry label="SAML 2.0 Bearer Assertion" value="saml2-bearer"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Apex_Class_Name__c" overridemetadata="false" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="TEXT"/>
        <field id="skuid__Auth_Method__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" defaultValue="oauth2">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="apex" label="Custom Apex Authentication"/>
            <entry value="oauth2" label="OAuth 2.0 / OpenID"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="SP_CompanyName" uionly="true" displaytype="TEXT" label="Company Name"/>
        <field id="SP_SiteCollection" uionly="true" displaytype="TEXT" label="Site Collection Path"/>
        <field id="SP_AuthUrlFormula" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Sharepoint Auth URL Formula" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>"https://"+{{{SP_CompanyName}}}+".sharepoint.com"+{{{SP_SiteCollection}}}+"/_layouts/15/OauthAuthorize.aspx"</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="SP_TokenUrlFormula" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Sharepoint Token URL Formula" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>"https://accounts.accesscontrol.windows.net/"+{{{SP_CompanyName}}}+".onmicrosoft.com/tokens/OAuth/2"</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Client_Certificate__c"/>
        <field id="AuthMethodType__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Auth Method Type" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>IF({{skuid__Auth_Method__c}}==="apex","apex",
IF({{skuid__Auth_Method__c}}==="oauth1" || {{skuid__Auth_Method__c}}==="oauth2","oauth","other"))</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Token_Request_Body_Parameters__c" overridemetadata="true" displaytype="OBJECT"/>
        <field id="SP_TokenReqBodyParamsFormula" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Token Req Body Params" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>IF({{skuid__Type__c}}==='sharepointonline','{"resource":"00000003-0000-0ff1-ce00-000000000000/'+{{{SP_CompanyName}}}+'.sharepoint.com@'+{{{SP_CompanyName}}}+'.onmicrosoft.com"}','')</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="OAuthDefaultScopesFormula__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Default Scopes Formula" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>IF(
   (CONTAINS({{skuid__Auth_Method__c}},'oauth')&&({{skuid__Type__c}}=='salesforce')),
   IF({{skuid__OAuth_Grant_Type__c}}=='explicit',
      'full,refresh_token','api'
   ),
   ''
)
</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Assertion_Signing_Certificate__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="param" value="id" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="Id" sourcetype="param" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Request_Headers__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{}"/>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Authorize_Endpoint_URL__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Token_Endpoint_URL__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Apex_Class_Name__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Type__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Client_Id__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Custom_Callback_URL__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Client_Secret__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>skuid__Auth_Method__c</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Authorize_Endpoint_URL__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{{SP_AuthUrlFormula}}}"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>SP_AuthUrlFormula</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Token_Endpoint_URL__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{{SP_TokenUrlFormula}}}"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>SP_TokenUrlFormula</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Token_Request_Body_Parameters__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{{SP_TokenReqBodyParamsFormula}}}"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>SP_TokenReqBodyParamsFormula</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Default_Scopes__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{{OAuthDefaultScopesFormula__ui}}}"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>OAuthDefaultScopesFormula__ui</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="custom" snippet="skuid.settings.onAuthProviderTypeChange"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>skuid__Type__c</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
      </actions>
    </model>
    <model id="stng__EncryptionSettings" limit="1" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasourcetype="" type="" sobject="skuid__Encryption_Settings__c" datasource="salesforce">
      <fields>
        <field id="skuid__Key__c"/>
        <field id="LastModifiedById"/>
        <field id="LastModifiedBy.Name"/>
        <field id="LastModifiedDate"/>
        <field id="skuid__JobId__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="userinfo" value="" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" userinfotype="organizationid" field="SetupOwnerId"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
  </models>
  <pageregioncontents>
