Name: Settings_CacheManagement
skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage globalfeedbackenabled="false" personalizationmode="server">
  <models>
    <model id="stng__CacheMgmt__InvalidateCache" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="salesforce" sobject="skuid__Loader_Service_Cache_Invalidation__e" limit="20">
      <fields>
        <field id="skuid__Loader_Service_Name__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions/>
    </model>
  </models>
  <components>
    <pagetitle uniqueid="sk-30on-303" model="stng__CacheMgmt__InvalidateCache">
      <maintitle>Manage Skuid Service Caches</maintitle>
      <actions/>
    </pagetitle>
    <wrapper uniqueid="sk-30xr-313">
      <components>
        <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-30vT-326" allowhtml="true">
          <contents>In Skuid API Version V2 Pages running in Visualforce, you may need to use these buttons to get Skuid to pick up on changes to certain Salesforce metadata for which Skuid is not able to automatically check to see if there have been changes.<br/><br/>

If you are using Custom Labels or Translation Workbench, and you modify a label or translation, Visualforce users will not see the label / translation change reflected until the second time they visit a page that requests the label. To force users to immediately get the modified label / translation change, click <b>Invalidate Custom Labels / Translations Cache</b> to force Skuid to go refetch all labels and translations.<br/><br/>

If you have modified Organization-wide settings, such as your Company Name, you will need to click <b>Invalidate Organization Settings Cache</b> to get Skuid to pick up on the latest changes.</contents>
        </template>
      </components>
      <styles>
        <styleitem type="background"/>
        <styleitem type="border" margin="left,bottom,top,">
          <styles>
            <styleitem property="margin-left" value="8px"/>
            <styleitem property="margin-top" value="20px"/>
            <styleitem property="margin-bottom" value="20px"/>
            <styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/>
          </styles>
        </styleitem>
        <styleitem type="size"/>
      </styles>
    </wrapper>
    <buttonset uniqueid="sk-30we-2711" position="left">
      <buttons>
        <button type="multi" label="Invalidate Custom Labels / Translations Cache" uniqueid="sk-30we-2720" icon="sk-icon-world">
          <actions>
            <action type="action-sequence" action-sequence-id="b505857b-0e52-49b8-b146-68349fa36829">
              <inputs>
                <input name="cacheName" value="labelsService"/>
              </inputs>
            </action>
          </actions>
        </button>
        <button type="multi" label="Invalidate Organization Settings Cache" uniqueid="sk-30wf-2725" icon="sk-icon-employment-info">
          <actions>
            <action type="action-sequence" datasource="DNB" action-sequence-id="b505857b-0e52-49b8-b146-68349fa36829">
              <inputs>
                <input name="cacheName" value="siteSettings"/>
              </inputs>
            </action>
          </actions>
        </button>
      </buttons>
    </buttonset>
  </components>
  <resources>
    <labels/>
    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="v1" filepath="js/skuidPages/skuidSettings.js" cachelocation="false" namespace="skuid"/>
    </javascript>
    <actionsequences uniqueid="sk-30oz-422">
      <actionsequence id="b505857b-0e52-49b8-b146-68349fa36829" label="Invalidate Loader Service Cache" type="reusable">
        <description>Invalidates a particular loader service cache</description>
        <actions>
          <action type="blockUI" message="Invalidating cache..."/>
          <action type="emptyModelData">
            <models>
              <model>stng__CacheMgmt__InvalidateCache</model>
            </models>
          </action>
          <action type="createRow" model="stng__CacheMgmt__InvalidateCache" appendorprepend="prepend" defaultmodefornewitems="edit" affectedrows="context">
            <defaults>
              <default valuesource="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Loader_Service_Name__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{$Input.cacheName}}"/>
            </defaults>
          </action>
          <action type="save">
            <models>
              <model>stng__CacheMgmt__InvalidateCache</model>
            </models>
          </action>
          <action type="emptyModelData">
            <models>
              <model>stng__CacheMgmt__InvalidateCache</model>
            </models>
          </action>
          <action type="blockUI" timeout="2000" message="Successfully invalidated cache."/>
        </actions>
        <inputs>
          <input type="value" name="cacheName"/>
        </inputs>
      </actionsequence>
    </actionsequences>
    <css/>
  </resources>
  <styles>
    <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
  </styles>
  <pageregioncontents/>
</skuidpage>

Name: Settings_ComponentPacks
skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage globalfeedbackenabled="false">
  <models>
      <model id="stng__OrgPreferences_ComponentPacks" limit="1" query="true" createrowifnonefound="true" sobject="skuid__Preferences__c" type="" datasource="salesforce">
      <fields>
        <field id="SetupOwnerId"/>
        <field id="skuid__Default_Builder_Theme__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="Composer Light"/>
        <field id="skuid__Default_Theme__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="Modern"/>
        <field id="skuid__Default_Mobile_Builder_Theme__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="MobileClassic"/>
        <field id="skuid__Default_Mobile_Theme__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="MobileClassic"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="userinfo" value="" field="SetupOwnerId" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" userinfotype="organizationid"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="action-sequence" action-sequence-id="4e99615b-386a-4aaa-822f-35987da0419b" input-loaderServiceNameField="skuid__Loader_Service_Name__c">
              <inputs>
                <input name="loaderServiceName" value="settingsService"/>
                <input name="cacheInvalidationModel" value="stng__LoaderServiceCacheInvalidation"/>
                <input name="loaderServiceNameField" value="skuid__Loader_Service_Name__c"/>
              </inputs>
            </action>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>models.saved</event>
          </events>
        </action>
      </actions>
    </model>
	<model id="stng__ComponentPacks" limit="100" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Component_Pack__c" orderby="skuid__Load_Order__c, skuid__Type__c" doclone="" type="" datasourcetype="" datasource="salesforce" processonclient="true" async="true" label="Component Pack" labelplural="Component Packs">
      <fields>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__Active__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__API_Version__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" defaultValue="v1" label="API Version">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="v1" label="v1"/>
            <entry value="v2" label="v2"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Resource_Name__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Resource_Namespace__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Load_Order__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Type__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" defaultValue="Any" label="Pages available in">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="Any" label="Any"/>
            <entry value="Desktop" label="Desktop Only"/>
            <entry value="Mobile" label="Mobile Only"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Runtime_Definition_File__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Builder_Definition_File__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="action-sequence" action-sequence-id="4e99615b-386a-4aaa-822f-35987da0419b" input-loaderServiceNameField="skuid__Loader_Service_Name__c">
              <inputs>
                <input name="loaderServiceName" value="componentPackService"/>
                <input name="cacheInvalidationModel" value="stng__LoaderServiceCacheInvalidation"/>
                <input name="loaderServiceNameField" value="skuid__Loader_Service_Name__c"/>
              </inputs>
            </action>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>models.saved</event>
          </events>
        </action>
      </actions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
  </models>
  <components>
    <pagetitle model="stng__OrgPreferences_ComponentPacks" uniqueid="1424702947986-328">
      <maintitle>Configure Component Packs</maintitle>
      <actions>
        <action type="savecancel" window="self" uniqueid="sk-3UuBep-261">
          <models>
            <model>stng__ComponentPacks</model>
          </models>
          <savehotkeys>
            <hotkey modifiers="ctrl" key="s"/>
            <hotkey modifiers="meta" key="s"/>
          </savehotkeys>
          <cancelhotkeys/>
        </action>
      </actions>
    </pagetitle>
    <skootable showconditions="true" showsavecancel="false" searchmethod="server" searchbox="false" showexportbuttons="false" pagesize="10" createrecords="true" model="stng__ComponentPacks" buttonposition="" mode="read" uniqueid="1424702947987-339">
      <conditions>
        <condition type="multiple" operator="not in" field="skuid__Resource_Name__c">
          <values>
            <value>InkComponents</value>
            <value>skuidbuilderComponents</value>
            <value>CoreComponents</value>
            <value>MobileCoreComponents</value>
            <value>VisualizationComponents</value>
          </values>
        </condition>
      </conditions>
      <fields>
        <field id="Name" readonly="false" valuehalign="" type="" required="true" allowordering="true" uniqueid="sk-3UuBgx-322"/>
        <field id="skuid__Resource_Name__c" valuehalign="" type="" uniqueid="sk-3UuBgy-324"/>
        <field id="skuid__Resource_Namespace__c" valuehalign="" type="" uniqueid="sk-3UuBgz-326"/>
        <field id="skuid__API_Version__c" valuehalign="" type="" required="true" allowordering="true" uniqueid="sk-3UuBh1-328">
          <renderconditions logictype="and">
            <rendercondition sourcetype="feature" value="CustomComponent"/>
          </renderconditions>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Type__c" valuehalign="" type="" required="true" allowordering="true" uniqueid="sk-3QpCh2-143">
          <label>Pages available in</label>
          <enableconditions logictype="and" message="Only available for V1 Component Packs.">
            <condition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" fieldmodel="stng__ComponentPacks" sourcetype="fieldvalue" field="skuid__API_Version__c" value="v1" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
          </enableconditions>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Load_Order__c" decimalplaces="" valuehalign="" type="" allowordering="true" uniqueid="sk-3UuBh4-330"/>
        <field id="skuid__Active__c" type="" valuehalign="" uniqueid="sk-3UuBh6-332"/>
      </fields>
      <rowactions>
        <action type="edit"/>
        <action type="delete"/>
        <action type="drawer" label="Additional Properties" icon="sk-icon-config" openicon="sk-icon-escalate">
          <drawer title="Drawer Area" closehandle="true">
            <components>
              <basicfieldeditor showheader="true" showsavecancel="false" model="stng__ComponentPacks" buttonposition="" mode="edit" layout="">
                <columns>
                  <column width="100%">
                    <sections>
                      <section title="Runtime/Builder Definition File Locations within component pack" collapsible="no">
                        <fields>
                          <field id="skuid__Runtime_Definition_File__c"/>
                          <field id="skuid__Builder_Definition_File__c"/>
                        </fields>
                      </section>
                    </sections>
                  </column>
                </columns>
              </basicfieldeditor>
            </components>
          </drawer>
        </action>
      </rowactions>
      <massactions usefirstitemasdefault="true"/>
      <views>
        <view type="standard"/>
      </views>
      <actions defaultlabel="Global Actions" defaulticon="sk-icon-magic" usefirstitemasdefault="true">
        <action type="multi" label="New Component Pack" icon="sk-icon-add">
          <actions>
            <action type="createRow" model="stng__ComponentPacks" appendorprepend="append" defaultmodefornewitems="edit">
              <defaults>
                <default type="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Active__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="true"/>
                <default type="fieldvalue" field="skuid__API_Version__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="v1"/>
                <default type="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Type__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="Any"/>
              </defaults>
            </action>
            <action type="showPopup">
              <popup title="Create new Component Pack" width="70%">
                <components>
                  <pagetitle model="stng__ComponentPacks">
                    <maintitle>Create new Component Pack</maintitle>
                    <actions>
                      <action type="multi" label="Cancel" icon="sk-icon-cancel" secondary="true">
                        <actions>
                          <action type="cancel">
                            <models>
                              <model>stng__ComponentPacks</model>
                            </models>
                          </action>
                          <action type="closeTopmostPopup"/>
                        </actions>
                      </action>
                      <action type="multi" label="Finish and Save" icon="sk-icon-save">
                        <actions>
                          <action type="blockUI" message="Creating new Component Pack..."/>
                          <action type="custom" snippet="skuid.newComponentPackPreSave">
                            <onerroractions>
                              <action type="blockUI" message="Unable to create Component Pack: {{$PreviousAction.error}}" timeout="1500"/>
                            </onerroractions>
                          </action>
                          <action type="save">
                            <models>
                              <model>stng__ComponentPacks</model>
                            </models>
                            <onerroractions>
                              <action type="blockUI" message="Unable to create Component Pack." timeout="1500"/>
                            </onerroractions>
                          </action>
                          <action type="closeTopmostPopup"/>
                          <action type="blockUI" message="Save successful! New Component Pack created." timeout="1500"/>
                        </actions>
                        <enableconditions logictype="and" message="Please provide values for all required fields.">
                          <condition sourcetype="fieldvalue" fieldmodel="stng__ComponentPacks" field="Name" type="blank" operator="!=" />
                          <condition sourcetype="fieldvalue" fieldmodel="stng__ComponentPacks" field="skuid__Resource_Name__c" type="blank" operator="!=" />
                        </enableconditions>
                      </action>
                    </actions>
                    <conditions>
                      <condition type="contextrow" field="Id" mergefield="Id"/>
                    </conditions>
                  </pagetitle>
                  <basicfieldeditor showheader="true" showsavecancel="false" model="stng__ComponentPacks" buttonposition="" mode="edit" layout="">
                    <columns>
                      <column width="100%">
                        <sections>
                          <section title="Choose a unique Prefix for Components in your Pack, e.g. "acmevisualizations"" collapsible="no">
                            <fields>
                              <field id="Name" valuehalign="" type="" required="true">
                                <label>Pack Id (lower-case alpha characters only)</label>
                              </field>
                            </fields>
                          </section>
                          <section title="Choose a friendly label for your Component Pack, e.g. "Acme Visualizations"" collapsible="no">
                            <fields>
                              <field id="skuid__Resource_Name__c" valuehalign="" type="">
                                <label>Pack Label</label>
                              </field>
                            </fields>
                          </section>
                          <section title="Which Skuid API Version should this Component Pack be available for?" collapsible="no">
                            <fields>
                              <field id="skuid__API_Version__c" valuehalign="" type="" required="true"/>
                            </fields>
                            <renderconditions logictype="and">
                              <rendercondition sourcetype="feature" value="CustomComponent"/>
                            </renderconditions>
                          </section>
                          <section title="Which type of Skuid Page should this Component Pack be available in?" collapsible="no">
                            <fields>
                              <field id="skuid__Type__c" valuehalign="" type="" required="true"/>
                            </fields>
                            <renderconditions logictype="and">
                              <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" fieldmodel="stng__ComponentPacks" sourcetype="fieldvalue" field="skuid__API_Version__c" value="v1" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
                            </renderconditions>
                          </section>
                          <section title="(Required ONLY if you are working in a Managed Package development org)" collapsible="no">
                            <fields>
                              <field id="skuid__Resource_Namespace__c" valuehalign="" type="">
                                <label>Org Namespace</label>
                              </field>
                            </fields>
                          </section>
                        </sections>
                      </column>
                    </columns>
                    <conditions>
                      <condition type="contextrow" field="Id" mergefield="Id"/>
                    </conditions>
                  </basicfieldeditor>
                </components>
              </popup>
            </action>
            <action type="custom" snippet="skuid.loadJSZip"/>
          </actions>
        </action>
      </actions>
    </skootable>
  </components>
  <resources>
  <labels/>
  <javascript>
    <jsitem location="staticresource" name="v1" filepath="js/skuidPages/skuidSettings.js" cachelocation="false" namespace="skuid"></jsitem>
  </javascript>
  </resources>
</skuidpage>

Name: Settings_DataSourceDetail
skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage globalfeedbackenabled="false" title="{{#$Model.stng__ModelDataSources.data.0.Name}}Data Source - {{{$Model.stng__ModelDataSources.data.0.Name}}}{{/$Model.stng__ModelDataSources.data.0.Name}}{{^$Model.stng__ModelDataSources.data.0.Name}}New Data Source{{/$Model.stng__ModelDataSources.data.0.Name}}">
  <models>
   <model id="stng__SiteEnv" label="SiteEnvironment" labelplural="SiteEnvironment" limit="20" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="Ui-Only" processonclient="true">
 <fields>
<field id="PLINY_WARDEN_HOST" displaytype="TEXT" label="PLINYWARDENHOST"/>
<field id="PLINY_WARDEN_PORT" displaytype="TEXT" label="PLINYWARDENPORT"/>
<field id="PLINY_WARDEN_VERSION" displaytype="TEXT" label="PLINYWARDENVERSION"/>
</fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="stng__ConnectionTest" query="true" createrowifnonefound="true" datasource="Ui-Only" processonclient="true" unloadwarningifunsavedchanges="false">
      <fields>
        <field id="status" displaytype="TEXT"/>
        <field id="message" displaytype="TEXT"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="stng__DataServices" limit="" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" type="" sobject="skuid__Data_Service__c" doclone="" orderby="Name" datasource="salesforce" processonclient="true">
      <fields>
        <field id="Id"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__Host__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Port__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="stng__CredCounts" limit="" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasourcetype="" type="aggregate" sobject="skuid__Model_Service_Credential__c" datasource="salesforce">
      <fields>
        <field id="Id" name="countId" function="COUNT"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions/>
      <groupby method="simple">
        <field id="skuid__Service_Name__c" name="ServiceName"/>
      </groupby>
    </model>
    <model id="stng__ModelDataSources" limit="1" query="true" createrowifnonefound="true" doclone="" sobject="skuid__Model_Service__c" datasource="salesforce" processonclient="true">
      <fields>
        <field id="skuid__Adapter_Name__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="COMBOBOX" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="salesforce" label="Data Source Type" picklistsource="snippet" snippet="skuid.settings.dataSources.getDataSourceTypePicklistEntries"/>
        <field id="skuid__Active__c"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="Id"/>
        <field id="skuid__URL__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Authentication__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" label="Authentication Method" defaultValue="none">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="none" label="No Authentication"/>
            <!--<entry value="apikey" label="API Key"/>-->
            <entry value="basicauth" label="Basic HTTP Authentication"/>
            <entry value="separateurl" label="Separate Authentication URL"/>
            <entry value="provider" label="Authentication Provider (OAuth, Custom, etc)"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Authentication_URL__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Auth_Request_Headers__c" overridemetadata="true" displaytype="OBJECT"/>
        <field id="skuid__Request_Headers__c" overridemetadata="true" displaytype="OBJECT"/>
        <field id="skuid__Use_Apex_Proxy__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="BOOLEAN" displaytype="BOOLEAN" helptext="Determines whether Skuid will funnel each data operation requesti.e. when models are queried or savedthrough its proxy. If unchecked, requests will come directly from the end user's browser."/>
        <field id="skuid__Use_Proxy_For_Auth__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="BOOLEAN" displaytype="BOOLEAN" helptext="Determines whether Skuid funnels authentication requestswhich happen when a new authenticated session beginsthrough its proxy. If unchecked, requests will come directly from the end user's browser. By default, this property matches the Use Apex Proxy property."/>
        <field id="skuid__Proxy_Host__c" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Data Service Host" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>IF(ISBLANK({{skuid__Data_Service_Id__c}}), MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__SiteEnv","PLINY_WARDEN_HOST"), MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__DataServices","skuid__Host__c","Id",{{skuid__Data_Service_Id__c}}))</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Proxy_Port__c" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Data Service Port" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>IF(ISBLANK({{skuid__Data_Service_Id__c}}), MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__SiteEnv","PLINY_WARDEN_PORT"), MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__DataServices","skuid__Port__c","Id",{{skuid__Data_Service_Id__c}}))</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Data_Service_Id__c" overridemetadata="true" displaytype="PICKLIST" required="true" label="Data Service" picklistsource="rowsinmodel" picklistmodel="stng__DataServices" entryvalue="{{{Id}}}" entrylabel="{{{Name}}}" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue"/>
        <field id="skuid__External_Id__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Cache_Time_Stamp__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Password__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="TEXT" label="Org-wide Default Password"/>
        <field id="skuid__Username__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="TEXT" label="Org-wide Default Username"/>
        <field id="skuid__Auth_Request_Body__c" overridemetadata="true" displaytype="OBJECT"/>
        <field id="skuid__Auth_Request_Body_Content_Type__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Auth_Provider__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Access__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Access_Permission_Name__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Request_Body_Parameters__c" overridemetadata="true" displaytype="OBJECT"/>
        <field id="skuid__Custom_Config__c" overridemetadata="true" displaytype="OBJECT"/>
        <field id="skuid__Request_URL_Parameters__c" overridemetadata="true" displaytype="OBJECT"/>
        <field id="skuid__Credential_Source__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" defaultValue="none" helptext="The level of specificity at which Usernames and Passwords can be stored. "Per User..." allows each user to enter their own username/password for this Data Source via the "My Credentials" UI, with Profile-level and Org-Wide credentials as optional cascading defaults. If "Shared: Per Profile" is used, then all users of a profile will share their profile's credentials, with Org-Wide credentials, if defined, being used as a default if no credentials are defined for that profile.">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="none" label="None"/>
            <entry value="org" label="Shared: Org-Wide"/>
            <entry value="profile" label="Shared: Per-Profile, with optional Org-wide Default"/>
            <entry value="user" label="Per-User, with optional Profile / Org-wide Defaults"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="AuthProviderMethod__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT" label="Authentication Provider Method">
          <formula>MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__AuthProviders","skuid__Auth_Method__c","Name",{{skuid__Auth_Provider__c}})</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="ShowCredentialSource__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Show Credential Source" readonly="true" returntype="BOOLEAN">
          <formula>IF({{skuid__Authentication__c}}==="none",false,
          IF({{skuid__Authentication__c}}==="provider" && ({{AuthProviderMethod__ui}}==="oauth1" || ({{AuthProviderMethod__ui}}==="oauth2" && {{AuthProviderGrantType}} !== "password")),false,IF({{skuid__Authentication__c}}==="saml",false,true)))</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="IsSQLDataSource__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" readonly="true" returntype="BOOLEAN" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue">
          <formula>CONTAINS_ANY({{skuid__Adapter_Name__c}},"PostgreSQL","MicrosoftSQL","MySQL","OracleDB","AmazonRedshift")</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="CustomDataService__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="BOOLEAN" label="Use Custom Data Service" defaultValue="true"/>
        <field id="ShowUNPW__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Show Username/Password" readonly="true" returntype="BOOLEAN">
          <formula>(({{skuid__Credential_Source__c}}==="org" || {{skuid__Credential_Source__c}}==="profile" || {{skuid__Credential_Source__c}}==="user")) && {{ShowCredentialSource__ui}}</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Client_Certificate__c"/>
        <field id="AuthProviderGrantType" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT" label="Authentication Provider Grant Type">
          <formula>MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__AuthProviders","skuid__OAuth_Grant_Type__c","Name",{{skuid__Auth_Provider__c}})</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="StoredCredCount__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Stored Credentials Count" readonly="true" returntype="DOUBLE" precision="17" scale="0">
          <formula>MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__CredCounts","countId","ServiceName",{{{Name}}})</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Auth_Request_Verb__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" defaultValue="POST">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="GET" label="GET"/>
            <entry value="POST" label="POST"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="SFMyDomainURL__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="URL" label="Salesforce My Domain URL" defaultValue="" helptext="The API URL for your Salesforce org, e.g. "https://acme-widgets.my.salesforce.com"/>
        <field id="SFAuthMethod__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="PICKLIST" label="Authentication Method" defaultValue="provider">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="provider" label="Authentication Provider (OAuth 2.0)"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="IsSalesforceService__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" readonly="true" returntype="BOOLEAN">
          <formula>{{skuid__Adapter_Name__c}}=='salesforce'</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="SFMyDomain__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="TEXT" label="My Domain" defaultValue="" helptext="To connect to Salesforce orgs with Skuid, these orgs must use My Domain. To configure your org for My Domain, go to /domainname/DomainName.apexp?setupid=OrgDomain"/>
        <field id="ShowDataSourceTypeSelectionStep" uionly="true" displaytype="BOOLEAN" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" defaultValue="true"/>
        <field id="skuid__Name_Identifier_Field__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" picklistsource="manual" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="federation_id" enclosevalueinquotes="true">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="--" label="User Fields" disabled="true"/>
            <entry value="email" label="Email"/>
            <entry value="federation_id" label="Federation Identifier"/>
            <entry value="username" label="Username"/>
            <entry value="--" label="" disabled="true"/>
            <entry value="--" label="Custom" disabled="true"/>
            <entry value="::formula" label="Result of Formula"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Name_Identifier_Formula__c"/>
        <field id="ODataVersion__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="PICKLIST" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" picklistsource="manual" required="true" label="OData Version">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="1.0" label="1.0"/>
            <entry value="2.0" label="2.0"/>
            <entry value="3.0" label="3.0"/>
            <entry value="4.0" label="4.0"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="ODataSupportsBatch__ui" displaytype="BOOLEAN" label="Supports Batch Operations" uionly="true"/>
        <field id="AllowedDataSourcesOfType__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" readonly="true" returntype="DOUBLE" label="# of Allowed Data Sources" precision="3" scale="0">
          <formula>IF(NOT(ISBLANK({{skuid__Adapter_Name__c}})),skuid_stng__GET_FEATURE_VALUE("DataSourceType:" + {{skuid__Adapter_Name__c}}),0)</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="ActualDataSourcesOfType__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="# of Data Sources of Type" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" precision="3" scale="0" readonly="true" returntype="DOUBLE" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue">
          <formula>IF(NOT(ISBLANK({{skuid__Adapter_Name__c}})),MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__ExistingDataSourcesByType","countId","dataSourceType",{{skuid__Adapter_Name__c}}) || 0,0)</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="DataSourceUsage__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Data Source Type Usage" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>IF(NOT(ISBLANK({{skuid__Adapter_Name__c}})),{{ActualDataSourcesOfType__ui}} + " / " + {{AllowedDataSourcesOfType__ui}},"N/A")</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="CanCreateNewDataSourcesOfType__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Can Create new Data Sources of Type" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" readonly="true" returntype="BOOLEAN">
          <formula>IF(NOT(ISBLANK({{skuid__Adapter_Name__c}})) && {{IsSQLDataSource__ui}},{{AllowedDataSourcesOfType__ui}} > {{ActualDataSourcesOfType__ui}},true)</formula>
        </field>
      </fields>
      <conditions>

      </conditions>

    <model id="stng__AuthProviders" limit="" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" type="" sobject="skuid__Auth_Provider__c" doclone="" orderby="Name" datasource="salesforce" processonclient="true">
      <fields>
        <field id="skuid__Authorize_Endpoint_URL__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Client_Id__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Custom_Callback_URL__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Client_Secret__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Default_Scopes__c"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="SetupOwnerId"/>
        <field id="SetupOwner.Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__Type__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" picklistsource="snippet" snippet="AuthProviderTypesPicklist"/>
        <field id="skuid__Token_Endpoint_URL__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__User_Info_Endpoint_URL__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Request_Headers__c" overridemetadata="true" displaytype="OBJECT"/>
        <field id="skuid__OAuth_Grant_Type__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" defaultValue="explicit" picklistsource="manual" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry label="Authorization Code" value="explicit"/>
            <entry label="Client Credentials" value="client_credentials"/>
            <entry label="Implicit" value="implicit"/>
            <entry label="Resource Owner Password Credentials" value="password"/>
            <entry label="SAML 2.0 Bearer Assertion" value="saml2-bearer"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Apex_Class_Name__c" overridemetadata="false" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="TEXT"/>
        <field id="skuid__Auth_Method__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" defaultValue="oauth2">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="apex" label="Custom Apex Authentication"/>
            <entry value="oauth2" label="OAuth 2.0 / OpenID"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="SP_CompanyName" uionly="true" displaytype="TEXT" label="Company Name"/>
        <field id="SP_SiteCollection" uionly="true" displaytype="TEXT" label="Site Collection Path"/>
        <field id="SP_AuthUrlFormula" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Sharepoint Auth URL Formula" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>"https://"+{{{SP_CompanyName}}}+".sharepoint.com"+{{{SP_SiteCollection}}}+"/_layouts/15/OauthAuthorize.aspx"</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="SP_TokenUrlFormula" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Sharepoint Token URL Formula" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>"https://accounts.accesscontrol.windows.net/"+{{{SP_CompanyName}}}+".onmicrosoft.com/tokens/OAuth/2"</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="NewSFAuthProvider_AuthUrl__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="New SF Auth Provider Auth Url" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>IF({{skuid__Type__c}}=="salesforce",{{{$Model.stng__ModelDataSources.data.0.skuid__URL__c}}} + "/services/oauth2/authorize","")</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="NewSFAuthProvider_TokenUrl__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="New SF Auth Provider Token Url" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>IF({{skuid__Type__c}}=="salesforce",{{{$Model.stng__ModelDataSources.data.0.skuid__URL__c}}} + "/services/oauth2/token","")</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Client_Certificate__c"/>
        <field id="AuthMethodType__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Auth Method Type" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>IF({{skuid__Auth_Method__c}}==="apex","apex",
            IF({{skuid__Auth_Method__c}}==="oauth1" || {{skuid__Auth_Method__c}}==="oauth2","oauth","other"))</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Token_Request_Body_Parameters__c" overridemetadata="true" displaytype="OBJECT"/>
        <field id="SP_TokenReqBodyParamsFormula" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Token Req Body Params" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>IF({{skuid__Type__c}}==='sharepointonline','{"resource":"00000003-0000-0ff1-ce00-000000000000/'+{{{SP_CompanyName}}}+'.sharepoint.com@'+{{{SP_CompanyName}}}+'.onmicrosoft.com"}','')</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="OAuthDefaultScopesFormula__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Default Scopes Formula" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>IF(
            (CONTAINS({{skuid__Auth_Method__c}},'oauth')&&({{skuid__Type__c}}=='salesforce')),
            IF({{skuid__OAuth_Grant_Type__c}}=='explicit',
                'full,refresh_token','api'
            ),
            ''
          )
          </formula>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Assertion_Signing_Certificate__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__Type__c" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="stng__AuthProviderType"/>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__Auth_Method__c" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="stng__AuthProviderMethod"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Request_Headers__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{}"/>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Authorize_Endpoint_URL__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Token_Endpoint_URL__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Apex_Class_Name__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Type__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Client_Id__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Custom_Callback_URL__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Client_Secret__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>skuid__Auth_Method__c</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Authorize_Endpoint_URL__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{{SP_AuthUrlFormula}}}"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>SP_AuthUrlFormula</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Token_Endpoint_URL__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{{SP_TokenUrlFormula}}}"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>SP_TokenUrlFormula</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Token_Request_Body_Parameters__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{{SP_TokenReqBodyParamsFormula}}}"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>SP_TokenReqBodyParamsFormula</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Default_Scopes__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{{OAuthDefaultScopesFormula__ui}}}"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>OAuthDefaultScopesFormula__ui</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="custom" snippet="skuid.settings.onAuthProviderTypeChange"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>skuid__Type__c</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
      </actions>
    </model>

    <model id="stng__DataSource_Warden" query="false" createrowifnonefound="true" datasource="SkuidDataService" label="Data Source" labelplural="Data Sources" type="readwrite" namefield="name" unloadwarningifunsavedchanges="false">
      <methods>
        <method type="query" verb="GET" endpoint="/api/v2/datasources/{{dataSourceId}}" payloadcontenttype="JSON"/>
        <method type="insert" verb="POST" successif="requestsucceeds" sendchanges="asjsoninbody" insertresponse="recordinbody" endpoint="/api/v2/datasources"/>
        <method type="update" verb="PUT" successif="requestsucceeds" sendchanges="asjsoninbody" endpoint="/api/v2/datasources/{{id}}"/>
        <method type="delete" verb="DELETE" endpoint="/api/v2/datasources/{{id}}" successif="requestsucceeds"/>
      </methods>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="param" value="id" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="id" sourcetype="param" sourceparam="dataSourceId" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
        <condition type="modelmerge" value="skuid__Proxy_Host__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__Proxy_Host__c" sourcetype="modelmerge" model="stng__ModelDataSources" sourceparam="host" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
        <condition type="modelmerge" value="skuid__Proxy_Port__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__Proxy_Port__c" sourcetype="modelmerge" model="stng__ModelDataSources" sourceparam="port" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
      </conditions>
      <fields>
        <field id="id" displaytype="TEXT" label="Id"/>
        <field id="name" displaytype="TEXT" label="Name" length="255" required="true"/>
        <field id="type" displaytype="TEXT" label="Data Source Type" required="true"/>
        <field id="is_active" displaytype="BOOLEAN" defaultValue="true" label="Is Active"/>
        <field id="url" displaytype="TEXT" label="Database Host, Port" helptext="The host name / IP address, and port, at which your database is accessible, e.g. "my-db.some-host.com:3306". Do NOT include "https://"." placeholder="e.g. my-db.some-host.com:3306, 123.45.678.90:5432"/>
        <field id="database_name" displaytype="TEXT" label="Database Name"/>
        <field id="database_username" displaytype="TEXT" label="Database Username"/>
        <field id="database_password" displaytype="TEXT" label="Database Password"/>
        <field id="config.ssl" displaytype="BOOLEAN" label="Use SSL to Connect"/>
        <field id="credential_source" displaytype="TEXT" label="Database Credential Source"/>
        <field id="credential_duration_seconds" label="Credential Duration (seconds)" displaytype="INTEGER" length="3"/>
        <field id="credential_username_source_type" displaytype="TEXT" label="Database Credential Source"/>
        <field id="credential_username_source_property" displaytype="TEXT" label="Database User Attribute Name"/>
        <field id="credential_groups_source_type" displaytype="TEXT" label="Database Groups Source"/>
        <field id="Host__ui" displaytype="TEXT" uionly="true" label="Database Host / IP Address" helptext="The host or IP address at which this database can be reached, e.g. "71.122.33.423" or "mydemoserver.mysql.database.azure.com"." placeholder="e.g. mydemoserver.mysql.database.azure.com, 71.122.33.423"/>
        <field id="Port__ui" displaytype="TEXT" uionly="true" label="Database Port" helptext="The port to which Skuid should connect to this database, e.g. 5432, 3306" placeholder="e.g. 5432, 3306"/>
        <field id="HaveAllRequiredFieldsForTestConnection__ui" displaytype="FORMULA" uionly="true" label="Have all required fields for Test Connection" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" readonly="true" returntype="BOOLEAN">
          <formula>NOT(ISBLANK({{Host__ui}})) && NOT(ISBLANK({{Port__ui}})) && NOT(ISBLANK({{database_name}})) && NOT(ISBLANK({{database_username}})) && NOT(ISBLANK({{database_password}})) && ({{Port__ui}} > 0) && ({{Port__ui}} < 66536) && skuid_stng__IS_VALID_HOST_OR_IP_ADDRESS({{Host__ui}})</formula>
        </field>
      </fields>
      <idfields>
        <field>id</field>
      </idfields>
      <actions>
        <action>
          <actions>

          <events>

            <field>Port__ui</field>
          </fields>
        </action>

    <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="datasource__MicrosoftDynamics" cachelocation="false">var args = arguments[0] || {},
    context = args.context || {},
    dataSourceRow = context.row || {},
    dataSourceName = dataSourceRow['Name'] || '',
    dataSourceUrl = dataSourceRow['skuid__URL__c'] || '',
    dataSourceProtocol = dataSourceUrl.split('//')[0]||'',
    dataSourceDomain = (dataSourceUrl.split('//')[1]||'').split('/')[0] || '',
    model = skuid.$M('msdynamics__DataSourceEditor'),
    prodVersion = 'crm_online',
    orgName = '<Your Organization\'s Name>',
    orgUrl = '<Your Organization\'s URL>';

if (!model) return;

if (dataSourceUrl.length > 0){
    if (dataSourceDomain.endsWith('crm.dynamics.com')){
        orgName = dataSourceDomain.slice(0,-17);
        orgUrl = dataSourceProtocol + '//' + dataSourceDomain;
    } else {
        prodVersion = 'crm_onpremise';
        orgName = null;
        orgUrl = dataSourceProtocol + '//' + dataSourceDomain;
    }
}

model.abandonAllRows();
model.adoptRows([{
    'DataSourceName': dataSourceName,
    'ProductVersion': prodVersion,
    'OrgName': orgName,
    'OrgUrl': orgUrl
}]);</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="datasource__MicrosoftDynamics_EditorModelUpdated" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
  $ = skuid.$,
    url = params.row['ServiceEndpoint'],
    dataSourceName = params.row['DataSourceName'],
    dataSourceModel = skuid.$M('stng__ModelDataSources'),
    dataSourceRow = dataSourceModel && dataSourceModel.getRows([{field:'Name',value:dataSourceName}])[0];

if (!dataSourceRow) return;

dataSourceModel.updateRow(dataSourceRow,{
    'skuid__URL__c': url
});</jsitem>

    <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="datasource__SAPGateway" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
  $ = skuid.$,
  context = params.context,
  model = context.model,
  row = context.row,
  isNewRecord = model.isRowNew(row);
if(isNewRecord) {
    model.updateRow(row, {
        skuid__Auth_Request_Headers__c: '{"X-CSRF-Token":"Fetch","Authorization":"Basic {{$Auth.BasicAuth}}"}',
        skuid__Auth_Request_Verb__c:'GET',
        skuid__Authentication_URL__c:'https://<SAP_DOMAIN>/sap/opu/odata/<PATH_TO_SERVICE>',
        skuid__Authentication__c:'separateurl',
        skuid__Credential_Source__c:'org',
        skuid__Request_Headers__c:'{"X-CSRF-Token":"{{$Auth.Response.Headers.x-csrf-token}}","Authorization":"Basic {{$Auth.BasicAuth}}"}',
        skuid__URL__c:'https://<SAP_DOMAIN>/sap/opu/odata/<PATH_TO_SERVICE>',
    });
}</jsitem>
    <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="datasource__OData" cachelocation="false">var args = arguments[0] || {},
    context = args.context || {},
    model = context.model || {},
    row = context.row || {},
    customConfigJSON = row['skuid__Custom_Config__c'] || '',
    customConfig = {};
    
if (!model) return;

try {
    customConfig = JSON.parse(customConfigJSON);
} catch(e) {}

model.updateRow(row, { 'ODataVersion__ui': customConfig['odata-version'] || "4.0" });
        model.updateRow(row, { 'ODataSupportsBatch__ui': customConfig['supports-batch'] || "false" });</jsitem>

     <model id="stng__SiteEnv" label="SiteEnvironment" labelplural="SiteEnvironment" limit="20" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="Ui-Only" processonclient="true">
 <fields>
<field id="PLINY_WARDEN_HOST" displaytype="TEXT" label="PLINYWARDENHOST"/>
<field id="PLINY_WARDEN_PORT" displaytype="TEXT" label="PLINYWARDENPORT"/>
<field id="PLINY_WARDEN_VERSION" displaytype="TEXT" label="PLINYWARDENVERSION"/>
</fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions/>
    </model>  
    <model id="stng__ConnectionTest" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="Ui-Only" processonclient="true" unloadwarningifunsavedchanges="false">
      <fields>
        <field id="status" displaytype="TEXT"/>
        <field id="message" displaytype="TEXT"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="stng__DataSources" limit="1" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" doclone="" sobject="skuid__Model_Service__c" datasource="salesforce" processonclient="true">
      <fields>
        <field id="skuid__Adapter_Name__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="TEXT" defaultValue="salesforce" label="Data Source Type"/>
        <field id="skuid__Active__c"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="Id"/>
        <field id="skuid__URL__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Use_Apex_Proxy__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Proxy_Host__c" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Data Service Host" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">        
          <formula>IF(ISBLANK({{skuid__Data_Service_Id__c}}), MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__SiteEnv","PLINY_WARDEN_HOST"), MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__DataServices","skuid__Host__c","Id",{{skuid__Data_Service_Id__c}}))</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Proxy_Port__c" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Data Service Port" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>IF(ISBLANK({{skuid__Data_Service_Id__c}}), MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__SiteEnv","PLINY_WARDEN_PORT"), MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__DataServices","skuid__Port__c","Id",{{skuid__Data_Service_Id__c}}))</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Proxy_Version__c" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Data Service Version" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
					<formula>IF(ISBLANK({{skuid__Data_Service_Id__c}}), MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__SiteEnv","PLINY_WARDEN_VERSION"), MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__DataServices","skuid__Version__c","Id",{{skuid__Data_Service_Id__c}}))</formula>
				</field>
        <field id="skuid__Data_Service_Id__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__External_Id__c"/>
        <field id="Id"/>
        <field id="CustomDataService__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="BOOLEAN" label="Use a Private Data Service" defaultValue=""/>
        <field id="IsSQLDataSource__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" readonly="true" returntype="BOOLEAN" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue">
          <formula>true</formula>
        </field>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="param" value="id" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="Id" sourcetype="param" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions>
      </actions>
    </model>
    <model id="stng__DataServices" limit="" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" type="" sobject="skuid__Data_Service__c" doclone="" orderby="Name" datasource="salesforce" processonclient="true">
      <fields>
        <field id="Id"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__Host__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Port__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Version__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="modelmerge" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="Id" mergefield="skuid__Data_Service_Id__c" model="stng__DataSources" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions>
      </actions>
    </model>
    <model id="stng__DataSource_Warden" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="SkuidDataService" label="Data Source" labelplural="Data Sources" type="readwrite" namefield="name" unloadwarningifunsavedchanges="false">
      <methods>
        <method type="query" verb="GET" endpoint="/api/v2/datasources/{{id}}"/>
        <method type="insert" verb="POST" successif="requestsucceeds" sendchanges="asjsoninbody" insertresponse="recordinbody" endpoint="/api/v2/datasources"/>
        <method type="update" verb="PUT" successif="requestsucceeds" sendchanges="asjsoninbody" endpoint="/api/v2/datasources/{{id}}"/>
        <method type="delete" verb="DELETE" endpoint="/api/v2/datasources/{{id}}" successif="requestsucceeds"/>
      </methods>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="modelmerge" value="skuid__External_Id__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__External_Id__c" sourcetype="modelmerge" model="stng__DataSources" sourceparam="id" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
        <condition type="modelmerge" value="skuid__Proxy_Host__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__Proxy_Host__c" sourcetype="modelmerge" model="stng__DataSources" sourceparam="host" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
        <condition type="modelmerge" value="skuid__Proxy_Port__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__Proxy_Port__c" sourcetype="modelmerge" model="stng__DataSources" sourceparam="port" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
      </conditions>
      <fields>
        <field id="id" displaytype="TEXT" readonly="true" label="Id"/>
        <field id="name" displaytype="TEXT" label="Name" length="255" required="true" readonly="true"/>
        <field id="type" displaytype="PICKLIST" required="true" label="Data Source Type" picklistsource="rowsinmodel" picklistmodel="stng__DataSourceTypes" entryvalue="{{{value}}}" entrylabel="{{{label}}}" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue"/>
        <field id="is_active" displaytype="BOOLEAN" defaultValue="true" label="Is Active"/>
        <field id="data_source_id" displaytype="TEXT" label="Data Source ID" required="true"/>
        <field id="url" displaytype="TEXT" label="Database Host, Port" helptext="The host name / IP address, and port, at which your database is accessible, e.g. "my-db.some-host.com:3306". Do NOT include "https://"."/>
        <field id="database_name" displaytype="TEXT" label="Database Name"/>
        <field id="database_username" displaytype="TEXT" label="Database Username"/>
        <field id="database_password" displaytype="TEXT" label="Database Password"/>
        <field id="config.ssl" displaytype="BOOLEAN" label="Use SSL to Connect"/>
        <field id="config.ssl-ca" displaytype="TEXTAREA" label="Server CA"/>
        <field id="config.ssl-key" displaytype="TEXTAREA" label="Client Key"/>
        <field id="config.ssl-cert" displaytype="TEXTAREA" label="Client Certificate"/>
        <field id="credential_source" displaytype="PICKLIST" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" picklistsource="manual" label="Database Credential Source" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" enclosevalueinquotes="true" defaultValue="org">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="org" label="All Skuid users share one database credential"/>
            <entry value="perusertemp" label="Generate temporary credentials for each Skuid user"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="credential_duration_seconds" label="Credential Duration (seconds)" displaytype="PICKLIST" returntype="DOUBLE" picklistsource="manual" enclosevalueinquotes="false" defaultValue="900">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="900" label="15 minutes"/>
            <entry value="1800" label="30 minutes"/>
            <entry value="2700" label="45 minutes"/>
            <entry value="3600" label="60 minutes"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="get_credentials_access_key_id" displaytype="TEXT" label="AWS Access Key Id"/>
        <field id="get_credentials_secret_access_key" displaytype="TEXT" label="AWS Secret Access Key" ogdisplaytype="PASSWORD"/>
        <field id="credential_username_source_type" displaytype="TEXT" label="Database Username Source" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" enclosevalueinquotes="true" defaultValue="userrecordfield"/>
        <field id="credential_username_source_property" displaytype="PICKLIST" label="Skuid user record field to use for database user name" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" picklistsource="manual" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="username" enclosevalueinquotes="true">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="username" label="Username"/>
            <entry value="email" label="Email"/>
            <entry value="federation_id" label="Federation Identifier"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="credential_groups_source_type" displaytype="TEXT" label="Database Groups Source" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" enclosevalueinquotes="true" defaultValue="shared"/>
        <field id="credential_groups_source_property" displaytype="TEXT" label="Database Group(s) Attribute Name"/>
        <field id="dso_import_error" displaytype="TEXT" uionly="true"/>
      </fields>
      <idfields>
        <field>id</field>
      </idfields>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="stng__DataSourceObjects" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="SkuidDataService" label="Data Source Object" labelplural="Data Source Objects" type="readwrite" namefield="name">
      <methods>
        <method type="query" verb="GET" endpoint="/api/v2/datasources/{{dataSourceId}}/entities"/>
        <method type="insert" verb="POST" successif="requestsucceeds" sendchanges="asjsoninbody" insertresponse="recordinbody" endpoint="/api/v2/datasources/{{dataSourceId}}/entities"/>
        <method type="update" verb="PUT" successif="requestsucceeds" sendchanges="asjsoninbody" endpoint="/api/v2/datasources/{{dataSourceId}}/entities/{{id}}"/>
        <method type="delete" verb="DELETE" endpoint="/api/v2/datasources/{{dataSourceId}}/entities/{{id}}" successif="requestsucceeds"/>
      </methods>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="modelmerge" value="skuid__External_Id__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__External_Id__c" sourcetype="modelmerge" model="stng__DataSources" sourceparam="dataSourceId" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
        <condition type="modelmerge" value="skuid__Proxy_Host__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__Proxy_Host__c" sourcetype="modelmerge" model="stng__DataSources" sourceparam="host" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
        <condition type="modelmerge" value="skuid__Proxy_Port__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__Proxy_Port__c" sourcetype="modelmerge" model="stng__DataSources" sourceparam="port" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
      </conditions>
      <fields>
        <field id="id" displaytype="TEXT" readonly="true" label="Id"/>
        <field id="name" displaytype="TEXT" label="Name" length="255" required="true"/>
        <field id="custom_config" displaytype="TEXT" label="Custom Config"/>
        <field id="data_source_id" displaytype="TEXT" label="Name" length="255" required="true"/>
        <field id="schema" displaytype="TEXT" label="Schema"/>
        <field id="table_name" displaytype="TEXT" label="Table Name" required="true"/>
        <field id="label" displaytype="TEXT" label="Label" required="true"/>
        <field id="label_plural" displaytype="TEXT" label="Plural Label" required="true"/>
        <field id="UpdatedDate" label="Last Modified" displaytype="DATETIME"/>
        <field id="CreatedDate" label="Created" displaytype="DATETIME"/>
        <field id="CreatedByID" label="Created By" displaytype="TEXT" accessible="true" filterable="true"/>
        <field id="UpdatedByID" label="Last Modified By" displaytype="TEXT" accessible="true" filterable="true"/>
      </fields>
      <idfields>
        <field>id</field>
      </idfields>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="stng__DSOImport" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="Ui-Only" processonclient="true" label="Data Source Table" labelplural="Data Source Tables">
      <fields>
        <field id="name" displaytype="TEXT" label="Table Name"/>
        <field id="url" displaytype="TEXT" label="Url"/>
        <field id="dsName" displaytype="TEXT" label="Data Source Name"/>
        <field id="schema" displaytype="TEXT" label="Table Schema"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions/>
    </model>
  </models>
  <pageregioncontents>
    <pageregioncontent regionid="sk-1uFo3V-67" uniqueid="sk-1uLo4g-22" defaultcontent="true">
      <components>
        <wrapper uniqueid="sk-2nCEhk-379">
          <components>
            <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-xxOCz-217" allowhtml="true" model="stng__DataSources">
              <contents><a href="/apex/skuid__SkuidSettings">Data Sources</a> > {{{Name}}} ({{skuid__Adapter_Name__c}})</contents>
            </template>
            <pagetitle uniqueid="sk-nJ0I2-509" model="stng__DataSources">
              <subtitle/>
              <actions>
                <action type="multi" label="Test Connection" stepid="step1" uniqueid="sk-1FTGn--906" window="self" icon="sk-webicon-font-awesome:plug">
                  <enableconditions logictype="and" message="Must save changes to check connectivity">
                    <condition type="fieldvalue" enclosevalueinquotes="false" fieldmodel="stng__DataSources" sourcetype="modelproperty" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" sourceproperty="hasChanged" value="false" operator="="/>
                    <condition type="fieldvalue" enclosevalueinquotes="false" fieldmodel="stng__DataSource_Warden" sourcetype="modelproperty" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" sourceproperty="hasChanged" value="false" operator="="/>
                  </enableconditions>
                  <actions>
                    <action type="blockUI" message="Testing..." timeout="10000"/>
                    <action type="custom" snippet="testConnection"/>
                    <action type="unblockUI"/>
                    <action type="showPopup">
                      <popup title="Connection Status" width="50%">
                        <components>
                          <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-1Ivl4w-1700" model="stng__ConnectionTest" allowhtml="true">
                            <contents><h2>{{status}}</h2>
                                <div>{{message}}</div></contents>
                          </template>
                          <buttonset model="stng__DataSources" uniqueid="sk-1Ivwnr-1760">
                            <buttons>
                              <button type="multi" label="OK" uniqueid="sk-1Ivx8a-1765" icon="sk-icon-arrow-right">
                                <hotkeys>
                                  <hotkey key="backspace" ignoretextinputs="true"/>
                                </hotkeys>
                                <actions>
                                  <action type="closeTopmostPopup"/>
                                </actions>
                              </button>
                            </buttons>
                          </buttonset>
                        </components>
                        <afterclose>
                          <action type="emptyModelData">
                            <models>
                              <model>stng__ConnectionTest</model>
                            </models>
                          </action>
                        </afterclose>
                      </popup>
                    </action>
                  </actions>
                </action>
                <action type="savecancel" label="New Button" uniqueid="sk-2n3vRA-248" window="self">
                  <models>
                    <model>stng__DataSource_Warden</model>
                    <model>stng__DataSourceObjects</model>
                  </models>
                  <savehotkeys>
                    <hotkey modifiers="ctrl" key="s"/>
                    <hotkey modifiers="meta" key="s"/>
                  </savehotkeys>
                </action>
                <action type="multi" uniqueid="sk-v7ff-376" icon="sk-icon-delete" secondary="true" label="Delete">
                  <actions>
                    <action type="cancel">
                      <models>
                        <model>stng__DataSources</model>
                        <model>stng__DataSource_Warden</model>
                      </models>
                    </action>
                    <action type="markRowsForDeletion" model="stng__DataSources" affectedrows="all"/>
                    <action type="markRowsForDeletion" model="stng__DataSource_Warden" affectedrows="all"/>
                    <action type="save">
                      <models>
                        <model>stng__DataSources</model>
                        <model>stng__DataSource_Warden</model>
                      </models>
                    </action>
                    <action type="redirect" window="self" url="/apex/skuid__SkuidSettings"/>
                  </actions>
                </action>
              </actions>
              <maintitle>Data Source: {{Name}}</maintitle>
            </pagetitle>

            <wrapper uniqueid="sk-39sGIZ-391">

                <skootable showconditions="true" showsavecancel="false" showerrorsinline="true" searchmethod="client" searchbox="true" showexportbuttons="false" pagesize="10" alwaysresetpagination="false" createrecords="false" model="stng__DataSourceObjects" buttonposition="" mode="read" responsive="true" uniqueid="sk-3A3sXx-418" emptysearchbehavior="query">

<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" personalizationmode="client">

        <field id="skuid__Adapter_Name__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="TEXT" defaultValue="salesforce" label="Data Source Type"/>

          <formula>IF(ISBLANK({{skuid__Data_Service_Id__c}}), MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__SiteEnv","PLINY_WARDEN_HOST"), MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__DataServices","skuid__Host__c","Id",{{skuid__Data_Service_Id__c}}))</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Proxy_Port__c" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Data Service Port" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">

        <field id="skuid__External_Id__c"/>
        <field id="Id"/>

        <field id="name" displaytype="TEXT" label="Name" length="255" required="true"/>
      </fields>

      <fields>

Name: Settings_DSOProfilePermissions
skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" personalizationmode="client" title="{{^$Model.Profile.data}}Data Source Object Permissions{{/$Model.Profile.data}}{{#$Model.Profile.data}}{{Profile.Name}}: {{/$Model.Profile.data}}{{#$Model.stng__DataSourceObjects.data}}{{name}}{{/$Model.stng__DataSourceObjects.data}}">
  <models>
    <model id="stng__SiteEnv" label="SiteEnvironment" labelplural="SiteEnvironment" limit="20" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="Ui-Only" processonclient="true">
 <fields>
<field id="PLINY_WARDEN_HOST" displaytype="TEXT" label="PLINYWARDENHOST"/>
<field id="PLINY_WARDEN_PORT" displaytype="TEXT" label="PLINYWARDENPORT"/>
<field id="PLINY_WARDEN_VERSION" displaytype="TEXT" label="PLINYWARDENVERSION"/>
</fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions/>
    </model>  
    <model id="stng__DataSources" limit="1" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" doclone="" type="" sobject="skuid__Model_Service__c" orderby="skuid__Adapter_Name__c, Name" datasource="salesforce" processonclient="true">
      <fields>
        <field id="skuid__Adapter_Name__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="TEXT" defaultValue="salesforce" label="Data Source Type"/>
        <field id="skuid__Active__c"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="Id"/>
        <field id="skuid__URL__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Use_Apex_Proxy__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Proxy_Host__c" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Data Service Host" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>IF(ISBLANK({{skuid__Data_Service_Id__c}}), MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__SiteEnv","PLINY_WARDEN_HOST"), MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__DataServices","skuid__Host__c","Id",{{skuid__Data_Service_Id__c}}))</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Proxy_Port__c" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Data Service Port" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>IF(ISBLANK({{skuid__Data_Service_Id__c}}), MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__SiteEnv","PLINY_WARDEN_PORT"), MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__DataServices","skuid__Port__c","Id",{{skuid__Data_Service_Id__c}}))</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Data_Service_Id__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__External_Id__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="param" value="dsid" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="Id" sourcetype="param" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions>
      </actions>
    </model>
    <model id="stng__DataServices" limit="" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" type="" sobject="skuid__Data_Service__c" doclone="" orderby="Name" datasource="salesforce" processonclient="true">
      <fields>
        <field id="Id"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__Host__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Port__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="modelmerge" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="Id" mergefield="skuid__Data_Service_Id__c" model="stng__DataSources" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions>
      </actions>
    </model>
    <model id="stng__DataSource_Warden" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="SkuidDataService" label="Data Source" labelplural="Data Sources" type="readwrite" namefield="name" unloadwarningifunsavedchanges="true">
      <methods>
        <method type="query" verb="GET" endpoint="/api/v2/datasources/{{dataSourceId}}"/>
      </methods>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="modelmerge" value="skuid__External_Id__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__External_Id__c" sourcetype="modelmerge" model="stng__DataSources" sourceparam="dataSourceId" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
        <condition type="modelmerge" value="skuid__Proxy_Host__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__Proxy_Host__c" sourcetype="modelmerge" model="stng__DataSources" sourceparam="host" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
        <condition type="modelmerge" value="skuid__Proxy_Port__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__Proxy_Port__c" sourcetype="modelmerge" model="stng__DataSources" sourceparam="port" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
      </conditions>
      <fields>

      </fields>

        <field>id</field>
      </idfields>
      <actions/>
    </model>

        <condition type="modelmerge" value="skuid__Proxy_Host__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__Proxy_Host__c" sourcetype="modelmerge" model="stng__DataSources" sourceparam="host" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>

                          </renderconditions>
                        </basicfieldeditor>
                        <template allowhtml="true" uniqueid="sk-3eJzHT-855">
                          <contents><br>Pages you want to be accessible offline must have a Visualforce page override that calls that page's "manifest".  This manifest is a static resource that tells the browser to save the files<br> 
        that run Skuid locally, allowing users to visit pages while offline.  You'll need to update this manifest if you make changes to pages that have been made aailable for offline use in Visualforce.<br><br>
        For a list of issues to watch for when using Offline Mode, see <a href="https://docs.skuid.com/latest/en/skuid/offline" target="_blank">Tutorial: Offline Mode</a>.
                          </contents>
                          <renderconditions logictype="and">
                            <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="false" fieldmodel="stng__OrgPrefs_Preferences" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="skuid__Offline_Mode__c" fieldtargetobjects="skuid__Preferences__c" value="true"/>

Name: SkuidCentral
skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" globalfeedbackenabled="false">
  <resources>
    <labels/>
    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="v1" filepath="js/skuidPages/skuidCentral.js" cachelocation="false" namespace="skuid"/>
    </javascript>
    <css>
      <cssitem location="inline" name="SkuidCentralCSS">#skuid-central-wrapper h1, #skuid-central-wrapper h2, #skuid-central-wrapper h3, .body-text, #skuid-central-wrapper a {
    font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
}

h1 {
    font-size: 29px;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: #484E54;
}

h2 {
    font-size: 19px;
    font-weight: 500;
    color: #484E54;
}
.top-banner {
    text-align: center;
    margin: 0 auto;
    max-width:450px;
}
.guide-tutorial-header {
    text-align:center;
    max-width:400px;
    margin:20px auto;
}
.button-set {
    margin-bottom:20px;
}
.main-content-wrapper {
    margin: 0 auto;
}
.guides-and-tutorials {
    margin: 0 auto;
}
.callout-image {
    margin:0 auto;
}
h3 {
    font-size: 16px;
    font-weight: 400;
    color: #686B71;
}

.body-text {
    font-size: 14px;
    margin-bottom:20px;
    color: #686B71;
}

a.reference-link {

    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="inline" name="Snippets" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
    
	var $ = skuid.$,
	    registerSnippet = skuid.snippet.registerSnippet;
	
	// Utility functions for changing z-index
	registerSnippet('z99',function(){
	   $('#tb-holder').addClass('z99');
	   $('#tb-nav').addClass('z99');
	});
	
	registerSnippet('removeZ99',function(){
	   $('#tb-holder').removeClass('z99');
	   $('#tb-nav').removeClass('z99');
	});
	
	// Preview page
    registerSnippet('previewPage',function(){
        var params = arguments[0],
            pagePreview = skuid.snippet.get('skuid.builder.page.preview'),
            pageModel = skuid.$M('Page'),
            pageRow = params.row.PreviewPage__r;
        pageModel.adoptRow(pageRow);
        pagePreview && pagePreview({
            model: pageModel,
            row: pageRow,
            // Specify that we want to preview in context of a particular theme
            params: {
                usetheme: skuid.$M('Theme').data[0].Name
            }
        });
    });
	
})(skuid);</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inline" name="iframeResizer" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){

})(skuid);</jsitem>

	          callback();

	          skuid.events.subscribe('page.rendered', callback);
